verses.verse: אֵל־ <WH410> God נְקָמ֥וֹת <WH5360> to whom vengeance יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD אֵ֖ל <WH410> belongeth O God נְקָמ֣וֹת <WH5360> to whom vengeance הוֹפִֽיַע׃ <WH3313> belongeth shew
הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <WH5375> Lift up שֹׁפֵ֣ט <WH8199> thyself thou judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> render גְּ֝מ֗וּל <WH1576> a reward עַל־ <WH5921> unto גֵּאִֽים׃ <WH1343> to the proud

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How רְשָׁעִ֥ים ׀ <WH7563> how long shall the wicked יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> LORD עַד־ <WH5704> against מָ֝תַ֗י <WH4970> How רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> how long shall the wicked יַעֲלֹֽזוּ׃ <WH5937> triumph

יַבִּ֣יעוּ <WH5042> [How long] shall they utter יְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> [and] speak עָתָ֑ק <WH6277> arrogantly יִֽ֝תְאַמְּר֗וּ <WH559> boast כָּל־ <WH3605> All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> do אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity
עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD יְדַכְּא֑וּ <WH1792> They break in pieces וְֽנַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <WH5159> thine heritage יְעַנּֽוּ׃ <WH6031> and afflict
אַ֭לְמָנָה <WH490> the widow וְגֵ֣ר <WH1616> and the stranger יַהֲרֹ֑גוּ <WH2026> They slay וִֽיתוֹמִ֣ים <WH3490> the fatherless יְרַצֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7523> and murder

וַ֭יֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> Yet they say לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> shall not see יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> The LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָ֝בִ֗ין <WH995> regard אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> neither shall the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

בִּ֭ינוּ <WH995> Understand בֹּעֲרִ֣ים <WH1197> ye brutish בָּעָ֑ם <WH5971> among the people וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <WH3684> and [ye] fools מָתַ֥י <WH4970> and when תַּשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <WH7919> when will ye be wise

הֲנֹ֣טַֽע <WH5193> He that planted אֹ֭זֶן <WH241> the ear הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> shall he not hear אִֽם־ <WH518> that יֹ֥צֵֽר <WH3335> ? he that formed עַ֝֗יִן <WH5869> the eye הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַבִּֽיט׃ <WH5027> shall he not see

הֲיֹסֵ֣ר <WH3256> He that chastiseth גּ֭וֹיִם <WH1471> the heathen הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> shall not he correct הַֽמְלַמֵּ֖ד <WH3925> ? he that teacheth אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge
יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יֹ֭דֵעַ <WH3045> knoweth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> the thoughts אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> that they [are] vanity

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <WH835> Blessed הַגֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> [is] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom תְּיַסְּרֶ֣נּוּ <WH3256> whom thou chastenest יָּ֑הּ <WH3050> O LORD וּֽמִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ <WH8451> him out of thy law תְלַמְּדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3925> and teachest

לְהַשְׁקִ֣יט <WH8252> That thou mayest give him rest ל֭וֹ מִ֣ימֵי <WH3117> from the days רָ֑ע <WH7451> of adversity עַ֤ד <WH5704> Until יִכָּרֶ֖ה <WH3738> be digged לָרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> for the wicked שָֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> until the pit

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִטֹּ֣שׁ <WH5203> will not cast off יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people וְ֝נַחֲלָת֗וֹ <WH5159> his inheritance לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יַעֲזֹֽב׃ <WH5800> neither will he forsake כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַד־ <WH5704> against

צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> unto righteousness יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> shall return מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> But judgment וְ֝אַחֲרָ֗יו <WH310> shall follow כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יָק֣וּם <WH6965> Who will rise up לִ֭י עִם־ <WH5973> against מְרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> for me against the evildoers מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> ? [or] who will stand up לִ֝י עִם־ <WH5973> against פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> for me against the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> wickedness

לוּלֵ֣י <WH3884> Unless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD עֶזְרָ֣תָה <WH5833> [had been] my help לִּ֑י כִּמְעַ֓ט ׀ <WH4592> had almost שָֽׁכְנָ֖ה <WH7931> dwelt דוּמָ֣ה <WH1745> in silence נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul
אִם־ <WH518> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> When I said מָ֣טָה <WH4131> slippeth רַגְלִ֑י <WH7272> My foot חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> thy mercy יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD יִסְעָדֵֽנִי׃ <WH5582> held me up

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> In the multitude שַׂרְעַפַּ֣י <WH8312> of my thoughts בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <WH7130> within תַּ֝נְחוּמֶ֗יךָ <WH8575> me thy comforts יְֽשַׁעַשְׁע֥וּ <WH8173> delight נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul

הַֽ֭יְחָבְרְךָ <WH2266> have fellowship כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> Shall the throne הַוּ֑וֹת <WH1942> of iniquity יֹצֵ֖ר <WH3335> with thee which frameth עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> mischief עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and חֹֽק׃ <WH2706> appointed

יָ֭גוֹדּוּ <WH1413> They gather themselves together עַל־ <WH5921> against נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> against the soul צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the righteous וְדָ֖ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֣י <WH5355> the innocent יַרְשִֽׁיעוּ׃ <WH7561> and condemn
וַיְהִ֬י <WH1961> has been יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> But the LORD לִ֣י לְמִשְׂגָּ֑ב <WH4869> is my defence וֵ֝אלֹהַ֗י <WH430> and my God לְצ֣וּר <WH6697> [is] the rock מַחְסִֽי׃ <WH4268> of my refuge

וַיָּ֤שֶׁב <WH7725> And he shall bring עֲלֵיהֶ֨ם ׀ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> אוֹנָ֗ם <WH205> upon them their own iniquity וּבְרָעָתָ֥ם <WH7451> in their own wickedness יַצְמִיתֵ֑ם <WH6789> and shall cut them off יַ֝צְמִיתֵ֗ם <WH6789> shall cut them off יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [yea] the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God
